pros: Very good culture, collaborative environment, diversity, inclusion
cons: Limited career advancement opportunity, uncertainty about future

pros:
- Friendly and supportive working environment
- Good health insurance benefit
cons:

job_title: Head of Knowledge Management in Hanoi
pros:
Oxfam has a big programme with a quite a number of projects on Good Governance which I like.
Oxfam provides great chances to share and learn from affiliates around the world. Knowledge Management is one of the three cores of oxfam.
cons: At the moment we are in the transition process that all affiliates are merged in Vietnam. Many things are changing. Less staff  more work.
not much, almost everything is good
